description:
This course is about transforming your mind in order to create the life you really want. Let's face it, most of us have been living with the same debilitating thoughts our entire lives and for what? We can change this anytime we are ready! This course will teach you how incorporating daily affirmations can have a tremendous effect on creating the life you want.

You will be in a position to refashion your life and add value anytime you feel a change is required.

Learning how to change our reality can be fun.

Who's ready to Transform Daily?

* Learn to change your mindset in an instant.

* Build your courage to create bold affirmations

* Create a new vision for your life

* Embrace the Power of Affirmations and Witness A New Life Unfold!

Overview:

This course includes 45 Affirmations designed to create a new conversation in your mind. I believe that change, real change begins within and you and I both have the power to change our conversation at anytime. The affirmations center around the following concepts: abundance, prosperity, accountability, purpose, thoughts and personal responsibility.

Each day we will focus on a new affirmation (all included via a downloadable file in the course) Free free to make any adjustment to the affirmations to suit your specific needs. During class I will go over the affirmation and provide commentary. We will then say the affirmations as a group. It is suggested that after class you reflect on the affirmation for 15-20 minutes and hold the affirmation front of mind during the course of your day.

The course thrives on your real life applications and we will meet once a week via a conference call to share our stories.

Upon completing this course you will have practical tools you can use in order to transform your current status in life or add increase valued for you already extraordinary life. See you in class. ENROLL TODAY! You have nothing to lose, this course is FREE.
title: Daily Affirmation, Daily Transformation
